name: Ethermon
description: Circa 2017, Ethermon was the very first blockchain battle game on Ethereum. Fast forward to present, Ethermon NFT collectors can now take their Ethermon to explore in the world famous decentralized 3D world (Decentraland) and challenging other players on battle ladders on the classic website Ethermon.io. Now also on Matic Polygon, Players can continue to use their old and new ethermon to join forces and continue their journey with one of the earliest and prestigious blockchain collectable assets.

name: Ember Sword
description: Ember Sword is a Platform-Agnostic Free-to-Play MMORPG with a player-driven economy, a classless combat system, and scarce, tradable cosmetic collectibles and land. Ember Sword has the fast-paced combat of aRPGs, combined with the isometric view and skill-based abilities of MOBAs, set in a persistent MMORPG fantasy universe.

name: Puzzle in a Bag
description: PIAB, or Puzzle in a Bag, is a Ghentian start-up company looking to make puzzling cool again, which is why we're selling the first ever physical puzzle turned into NFTs. We create culturally relevant puzzles that contain fun, out-of-the-box references to the topic of every puzzle.

name: Market Discounts
description: Special collection of NFTs that can be redeemed for credits in the Arkane Market. Don't know how to redeem? Just contact us via the support chat.

name: Battle Racers
description: Battle Racers is an action-packed blockchain racing game where you design, build, and race NFT cars on arcade-sized tracks. Customize your car in the garage by mixing and matching parts and weapons. Different parts have different stats and skills, contributing to your carâ€™s overall performance. Do you choose speed over handling? Firepower or defense? Create the perfect car to match your playstyle and beat other players to the finish line.

name: BlockTimeBuddies
description: Original characters as crypto collectibles by Printmaker Kristiina Lehtonen

name: Logan Paul Digital Collectibles
description: Logan Paul's first edition NFTs, his own line of Pokemon-inspired non-fungible tokens (NFTs).

name: Lootex Creator Series
description: Built for creators by magic and heart.

name: CryptoPick
description: NFTs associated to CryptoPick, a market prediction game that rewards players in ETH, NFTs, and more while unlocking valuable trading insights.

name: Neon District
description: Neon District is a free-to-play, cyberpunk, role-playing game created by Blockade Games. It features collectible NFTs on the Ethereum and Matic/Polygon networks. Players can compete in several forms of competitive, multiplayer modes: PvP, Neon Pizza (Delivery, Ambushing, Fencing). Neon Pizza is the play-to-earn model that allows players to be able to directly earn Neon through 3 different avenues, including different tiers for more experienced players. Neon is the in-game resource within Neon District that can be used to upgrade weapons, armor, and characters.

name: Trade Race Manager by IOI
description: First crypto gaming manager powered by IOI and NFTs!

name: Polygon NFT Minter
description: Mint NFTs for free on Polygon

name: Polygon NFT Minter
description: Mint NFTs for free on Polygon

name: Polygon NFT Minter
description: Mint NFTs for free on Polygon

name: Polygon NFT Minter
description: Mint NFTs for free on Polygon

name: TaaviLehtonenArt
description: Taavi Lehtonen is an artist who uses traditional methods and makes his art available on Ethereum. The owner of the NFT token owns the original painting. No computer generated art!

name: Big Fat Sexy Collectible Card Experience
WiV Wine
description: WiV makes it easier for producers and merchants to offer their wares, distributors to know where specific bottles are, and buyers to understand the provenance of what they are buying. WiV is working with producers to tokenize entire vintages of investment-grade wine, significantly increasing the volume of wine assets on the platform and ensuring this wine has a digital record of its provenance from the moment that it is bottled.
